DataElement.preferredName: Performance Status Follow-up Score Event Month Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the month of obtaining the score of the Performance Status Scale during this follow-up period.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities._Monitoring a person's health over time after treatment.  This includes keeping track of the health of people who participate in a clinical study or clinical trial for a period of time, both during the study and after the study ends._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Concepts.definition: A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of J. Gardner 7/2010 mc Released per TCGA approval 8/10/2010 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.: A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.
A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
